content: A Nightmare - I give up. Lost 26K and I can't get it back. My Gcash SIM was deactivated. Tried every recovery option possible. None of them work and half the time the app crashes before I can finish. Been trying for over a month to verify a new account but it always fails and I get the same email. Customer service is incompetent and useless. They NEVER follow up your ticket. Find another option this app is horrible.

very poor system. i used biometrics for easier and quick access, but even the process of verifying my finger print took so much time before it crashed down. it took me several attempts to log in before i was able to use it properly, but there were still times when it would suddenly crashed while i was in the process of sending money to other banks. this got my patience running thin. i swear, it made me want to swing my phone out of frustration. updating the app doesn't help a bit.

If I could give half a star or even no stars at all, i would have given it. I have money inside of my account and I can't even access it because guess what? The app doesn't let me. I already turned off my developer options because I figured that that was the problem about how secure my phone was. Still, no response. The farthest I got was scanning my face. I scanned my face about a dozen times already but it still ended up crashing or kept saying that it has a system problem whatsoever.FIX IT!!!

Recently, this app is VERY, and I mean VERY, frustrating to use. First was the "not secure" notif. that I received every time I open the app. It forcibly closes the app. Now, I think the issue is resolved(?), comes the second issue, the facial recognition. I have scanned my face more than a dozen now and still can't process my face. And when successfully scanned, it says that the procedure has problem and try again later. Because of this, I'm slowly converting to other app if this issue keeps up

Recently, whenever I use this app it's automatically log out and telling that my phone is "not secure". It keeps showing whenever l use the app for transactions. Also, the inbox, there's a time that it didn't show and some of the features didn't work properly. Then the app, always updating and there's no new at all. No new features or whatsoever..

Everytime I open the app and a Messenger head pops up, the app closes and says that my device is not secure. This is really troublesome because I have to repeat transaction that I am about to do. Also, the app is very slow, and sometimes unresponsive. There are times where the app does not load at all. Hoping for these issues to be fixed.

I am not enjoying whatever update they had. Suddenly, my device isn't secure and keeps on locking my account. Plus they did not close my other account when I requested previously to close it because back then I should only wait for 6 months without balance for it to be deactivated, a year has passed and my other account still exists. :) It's not a good app anymore. Too laggy and crashes instantly - transactions are difficult to complete. I do not recommend it.

App experience has become terrible to worse. Adding extra useless security features can only worsen the overall experience to general consumers. Despite of the security measures, I can still use mine perfectly on a rooted and open phone and have the app updated as always. So I'd say these updates are pretty terrible and waste of space. As an app developer, I' d rather focus on other things to improve the overall service reliability, stability and experience.

I've exhausted all troubleshooting steps on my phoneâ€”uninstalling suspicious apps, disabling developer options, ensuring the phone is unrooted, and disabling installation via untrusted sources. Despite using this since 2018, I can't access it by any means. PC Android emulators won't work either, and buying another device just for this purpose isn't a practical solution. To the software team in charge, it's frustrating that this issue persists.

I've been using GCash for more than a year now, and suddenly "...the device you're using is not secure." It pops up consistently and out of nowhere it automatically back from the start. It's kinda frustrating because I couldn't finish my transaction as quickly as possible. Can someone address this concern. Thanks!

My experience with this app is so irritating. This app keeps on disappearing from my app drawer and whenever I'm logging in it will always say "something went wrong". I already checked my internet connection and all that i can do to fix this, but nothing happens. There are also some instances when I sign in it will say "this feature does not support Android ver4.4 and lower" even though my phone is in a latest version of Android. What's wrong with this?

The actual app is missing after I updated the app. I can't find it anywhere, can't even search it online cause I don't think anyone has the same problem as I am. The instructions are so vague that it would just quite literally confused you to the point of frustration. Fix this, immediately cause I have to use it asap and probably those who have the same issue as me does too.

I keep on having a device security issue when using your app. I never experienced this before, it just happen suddenly for no apparent reason. I cannot even finish my transactions and payments to be made. the app crashes endlessly. User experience is awful. I tried all of the solutions/tutorial found in different sources e.g. YT, reddit, etc but no success. Tried to reinstall the app but the issue still persist. Any updates when it will be fixed?

My phone has not been tampered with, it is not in developer mode, nor is it rooted. However, whenever I try logging in GCash by inputting my password, I keep getting an error message stating that my device is not secure and it automatically closes the app. This is very frustrating to me because I cannot complete transactions, especially in areas that do not accept cards. Please fix this. It's been an issue for months.

Firstly, when i attempt to update the app, it is missing from my device. Adittionally, upon opening the Play Store, I only see an uninstall button and there is no option to open the app. Furthermore, I am hesitant to delete the app as it may result in the loss of my data and the money in my account. Therefore, I kindly request assistance in resolving this issue.Thank you.:)

This app has a lazy "security" requirement that the phone's Developer Options should be disabled. This is not an industry standard. Makes you wonder how secure their app and online services really are. It is also buggy with "something went wrong" always popping up. Plus there's an irritating full screen ad EVERY TIME you open the app.

Despite the volume of transaction, my points are decreasing? for what reason? it's because I'm using it more frequent? Crazy!!!. It's also crashing many times...Detected something, den black screen den exit...again and again. it's disturbing. if it Detected something then why the app is not mentioning or redirect it for the user to fix it.ðŸ¤·. It's just that too many are using Gcash. Hay! May you continue to improve for a better experience. thanks you!

it's not just wasting my time logging in, saying update or connect to wifi even I'm connected to wifi. this is too much of a trouble when having a transaction, pls do fix this and do something bcs my patience in re-installing and waiting for it to be used again is gone, that I just want to throw my phone cuz I can't do my transactions neither open the app!!

the app and the service are both unreliable. theres always something wrong with this app when you need to use it. my ticket has been open since november but all i get is a templated reply. the hotline is also just an ivr. no one is really answering my concern or contacting me. i had a very humiliating experience paying at a store because the app kept failing even after troubleshooting. so disappointing. a multi-million-peso company who doesnt care about their loyal customers.

Constantly updating with barely any improvements and they want consumers to be the ones to make the adjustments for security instead of actually making their app more secure. Good luck getting android users to use your app. Absolutely littered with ads, the UI is slow and sometimes unresponsive, constant pestering with tutorials. Overall just a terrible experience. Don't bother. I used to like this app for the convenience but now that convenience has disappeared.

so much updating that needs to be done. i get that you're trying to make it 'creative' in every season. but if we have to update it everytime, just please stick to the original layout, purpose or design, it would be less hassle, even the system stays the same after so much updating. also, stop with the tutorial everytime you open the app, i don't need it when i've used it for the nth time!

This app always let you do an update, you cannot access your account unless you update. And it is all the time. Very inconvenient. When paying bills, it never finishes the transaction, though money is already deducted from account. Also, if you have multiple devices this app is not user friendly. All in all, this app is no good and cumbersome. Dont bother using this app, if you want a straight forward, user friendly, amd secured app.

When I attempt to update the app it is missing from my device. In addition upon open the play store, I only see an uninstall button and there is no option to open the app as it may results in the loss of my data and the money in my account. Therefore I kindly request assistance in resolving this issue. Thank you.ðŸ˜¢ðŸ˜¢ðŸ™

Unable to access GCash when dev options is enabled? seriously!? network errors!? bruh! are you dev. doing your work properly do you know what your doing? especially dev options it a built-in function,and very useful in low end phones.just to use the app you need to disable it and enable it again afterwards too much hassle! Network Error,Bruh! Either I'm connected to Wifi or using data this sht still randomly appears! closes the app especially when in a very important transactions!FRUSTRATING AF!

This app before is very convenient and quickly open without using any data charges,but now it become more hassle and it's not that accessible any time you want to open. The features crashed and every week it was recommended for an update. Now, for me it was getting into my nerves and it's not become convenient, it only shows loading and unloading. Ugh it was time consuming to log in at all.

Fix your application. I initially thought that the issue was with my phone but apparently not. I can't use Gcash for ANY transactions because the popup "your device is not secure.." is causing it to crash every time. The help link provided does not do anything and it's genuinely frustrating because I use this app for a lot of transactions. The lack of resolution and assistance is disappointing. Do better.

Experience with this app is absolutely horrible. To login, I have to input my MPIn but then it doesn't recognize my MPIN, then support asks me to reset but only after being sent several delayed OTP messages and only to find that after inputting the correct one that it gives me "Something is wrong" message. It is an endless loop of trying to login but I keep getting stonewalled my idiotic contingencies that rely on 1 factor OTP that doesn't even work!

The app keeps updating even if there is nothing to update, it completely takes over my phone storage and i don't even have enough storage already. The recent face scanning feature is also not working properly, it keeps telling me scanning failed and that i should put my face in frame and in a well lit area, my face IS in the frame and i was already in a VERY well lit area, i even went outside so that its brighter. This just keeps getting worse,now i can't get my allowance that i need for school.

A very complicated app, I connot even transfer money on time. Yes! I can do cash in, but whenever I do transferring money it always state ISSUE ISSUE ISSUE even if I tried multiple times, and it also requires an update not just once a month perhaps whenever I updated it I expect I can transact smoothly but just always end up DISSAPOINTED. they should do something or fix this app mostly there's a lot of people using it.

Worst app and service I've ever used. What used to be a convenient online payment app is now a huge mess when it started crashing all because my developer options are turned on and then it claims my phone is rooted even though I didn't. It still doesn't work even if I reinstall it. I even submitted a ticket and they didn't bother replying. It's very frustrating that I can't pay fast and easy anymore and now I have to switch to another app that doesn't act like this. Good riddance!

Just 2 days ago after this app have been updated to the newest version, it gives me no 'open' option, but only 'uninstall'. Cannot find it anymore anywhere on my phone. The stress is too much when I needed the money to pay for my purchase but ended up paying in cash. The help center doesn't give us option to chat with a live person to fix the problem. Tightened security is good, but this won't help especially when technical issues are involved. It just leaves no choice but to let stress subside.

not working can't create new account ðŸ˜¡ 0/5 Slow and keeps crashing! Updates should make navigation of the application seamless and easier, but what we are currently experiencing is otherwise. Noted that a lot of users have already raised concerns about how the application "behaves" at the moment. Your technical team should have sent already a text or email blast about the issue and how can this issue be resolved. Do you, somehow, expect your users to figure out how this is issue can be fixed???

The app keeps disappearing from the App Drawer. The issue started around October. The app disapeared all of a sudden and when I looked at the Playstore, the only option is to uninstall. Uninstalled and reinstalled the app and it worked for a couple of days. Until it diaappeared again. I was thinking that it was a problem with my phone, so I had to reset it. Installed the app again with a fresh setup. Worked for a couple of days and its gone again. Horrible.

App prevents itself from opening after the latest update, when the android developer mode/options are turned on. A message at boot shows that. This has never been an issue before; I use quite a few options from that menu. Normies.. even showed that I needed to disable the installation of unknown source apps. Ridiculous! Also, these damn per-boot ads and tutorials! I had a line in a grocery held up because a QR code wouldn't scan, but as it turns out I needed to finish the damn tutorial.

It's frustrating, the app suddenly disappear from the drawer. It also keep saying that, my device is not secured even though I don't have or own any harmful application and my device is fully secured. It also said that, for me to be protected, the app is needed to be closed. It's getting annoying, I've tried to shutdown my device hoping that it go back to normal but it didn't. I've tried to login multiple times but I keep getting the same result. Do your thing please!!

The app used to be outstanding, but lately it's been driving me crazy. It always indicates that I need to disable my developer options before opening an account. The developer options protect my phone's security and privacy that's why I don't want to turn it off and on all the time just to use the app. The software didn't require this kind of regulation in the past, thus administrators must resolve and fix this.

I had to uninstall and reinstall this app a lot of times this month due to crashes and "no internet" issues. I noticed that for every update, the app loses some of its basic features like actually launching the app and the help tab being functional in the login/mpin. I hope they stabilize the app and fix these crashing issues. Otherwise, people would really move to another more secure mobile wallet. Yikes!

I keep getting errors, claiming that my device is not secure, which causes the app to force close even though my phone is not rooted or jailbroken. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling, with the same results. I recently noticed that the app is working a lot slower these days. Really soured my experience on the app and caused a lot of annoyance when making my necessary financial transactions. (2)

Very unreliable and many time it freezes despite having excellent internet connection. Moreover, the devs focuses more on the look and feel of the app rather than fixing the bugs. Lastly, my overall experience of the app is very frustrating as it not working when you needed it the most. To the devs and the people behind this app, Globe. Please, fix the bugs since there are people like me who like to cash out but can't due to your app not working properly.

Slow and keeps crashing! Updates should make navigation of the application seamless and easier, but what we are currently experiencing is otherwise. Noted that a lot of users have already raised concerns about how the application "behaves" at the moment. Your technical team should have sent already a text or email blast about the issue and how can this issue be resolved. Do you, somehow, expect your users to figure out how this is issue can be fixed??? Being pro-active is part of a good service!

The app always mysteriously disappearing on my smartphone but upon checking on the Settings>Apps>Manage Apps, its in there installed. I have to reinstall to make it appear which is a hassle to do again and again before using it. This happen mutiple times already and started happen months ago but still no fix. Now I have to reinstall again ðŸ¥²

Been using this app for 3years and i never had an issue but this last 3mos? Gosh, everytime i open it, it requires an update, yet it crashes more often now. I already lost count of how many times i have uninstalled/installed this app just to make it work but, unfortunately, same thing still. It is not as reliable as before.

The app closes all the time saying my phone is not secured and I should disable developer's options, but even if I did just that, it still closes. Also, I HATE HOW YOU CAN'T USE THE APP UNLESS YOU UPDATE IT, AND IT HAS UPDATES ALL THE TIME! WHEN THERE'S NOT EVEN A CHANGE WITH THE MOST COMMON ERRORS/PROBLEMS. Every time I have to use the app to pay on stores, it says I have to update! It's really frustrating.

It keeps crashing. The maintenance for yhe system isn't that updated. Sometimes it works but, most of the time this app isn't working because of an unknown error. I think if this thing continue. There's a lot of user's will absolutely lose their trust on this app. You keep on promising your user that you'll fix the system error of the app yet there's nothing had been changed.

It's so annoying that they have NO feedback channel for reporting bugs and requesting improvements and features in the app itself. All their help channels are 100% focused on account problems, with not a single channel to just report general feedback about the app. I want to report that it's very frustrating the saved bank account list is ordered in the original add order, not in a most recently used order with newly added one at the top (not bottom) of the list, or my own choice of sorting.

The app is almost always acting up: - It takes too long to log in if it logs in at all. - The QR Scanner is almost always down. Besides these, the app always asks for an OTP even if the biller is already regular. If the OTP takes long to be sent and/or encoded into the system, the phone is immediately tagged "unsafe" which locks me out of the system for at least 24 hours. Overall, the security's system of inquiry is suspect, and the whole system experience rather abysmal.

I don't know why but your app has become totally unusable for me. Getting a message "something went wrong. Check your internet connection" but my connection was fine. Re-installing fixed the issue, but now, the app crashes after saying "your phone is not secure blah blah..." when i have never rooted my phone and the developer options are disabled. I have used gcash in this phone for 5 years until this recent update. Please fix this as I can see I'm not the only one getting the same problem.

App keep disappearing. This is so frustrating, like how many times should we uninstall and reinstall the app? I hope you can fix this issue, this is not convenient anymore. 11/9/2023 Issue still not fixed. Imagine the inconvenience, when I need to pay and find out the app has disappeared again. And this happens everyday already. This is infuriating, from a money related app at that and it's working this way. Find a way to have this resolved.

Terrible verification process. I did like 20 attempts already to get my account verified, still didn't get through even thou I have a valid ID. It always sent me text messages that they couldn't verify the photo I submitted and that it should be a clear selfie. Everytime I scan my face for verification, it's blurry. Tried again and again, tried switching phone, still the same. It made me so upset. I tried to get verified in maya app, it only took a minute. What a shame gcash! Trash!

It is infuriating everytime I have to used it, it needs to be updated. It is not just consuming ur time but also your storage. Like as if the updated version is great and is convenient for me, but naaah, looks like the same. You should give your user an option to update it or not, and if we won't, we can still able to use the app. This app is so conveniently inconvenient. Edited to 1 star .. It is still infuriating... Lots of problems encountered in this app everytime I will used it.

This always get updates which is getting annoying and even though this should be easily accessible and can be used everywhere, it takes a long time for it to open/load alongside with the constant crashing making the process very tiring. I also like to add how FRUSTRATING this is especially when it comes to facial recognition, i have tried it a bunch of times and it still need me to retry, because of this i cant use or access my gcash account. DESPITE THE FREQUENT UPDATES, IT'S STILL AWFUL.

This app and the GCash service is going downhill, as you add useless features and disruptive ads. The main features are all deteriorating, as after years of relatively successful use, I suddenly cannot reliably send money and I cannot pay at most stores. Also I cannot complete re-verification as a fully-verified user which was required for some additional features. The useless customer service recommended re-installing the app, but instead of resolving the issues, I now cannot log in any more.

i'm frustrated because everytime i open the app to send money or buy load, it keeps saying that "the system detected that the device you are using is not secure" so it keeps closing. if i have important transaction, i cannot proceed because of that! and it says to check first if my transaction went through when it did not! another one, it keep saying to check my internet connection when it is completely fine!

Very frustrating. I only ever use this app because I don't usually physically get money, so I have to rely on this. Overall, the experience is 60% slow loading (compared to every other app on my phone) and updates that show up at innapropriate times (and takes very long). I heard there are a lot of other issues but since those aren't mine, I'll leave that up to other ratings/news about this app to tell it for me. It has one use I need it for (payment), it does deliver- but it's still difficult.

This app is so trashy. I just updated this app and I regretted it since even though I put the correct MPIN, it keeps saying some error occurred. My internet connection is stable, no issue with that. The fault is on the app itself. And every time I update it, the app icon disappears on my homescreen and it is annoying to put it back again for convenience purposes. This app is the only one that updates few times a month but it keeps getting trashy after every update. Waste of tume and patience.

Recent changes suck so much it made me leave my first review on an app. I mean, making us turn off developer options?! Didn't it at least occur to your devs that perhaps there are valid, non-nefarious uses for that (I use it for faster animations, pointer location, and Bluetooth audio codecs)?? Why should the users bear the consequences of your poor security instead of, you know, investing on it on your side (I mean, that's what the fees, ads, and downtimes are for, right??) Incompetent.

This app used to be convenient but now it's getting harder to log in due to unnecessary updates that only the icon seems to be the only change in the feature of the app and it also automatically log out with a notification that I need to turn off some features on my device because it makes it unsecure. I have to restart my phone in order to go through my transactions and it causes hassle.

THE VERIFICATION PROCESS IS TOO STUPID AND TOO MUCH OF A HASSLE. I've been following the instructions but there would only be try agains! and I have tried more than a dozen times! This is too stupid. The camera function of the verification process is stupid too, it's too slow in scanning IDs and finding the perfect angle is so damn hard. Then the face recognition is also stupid, I couldn't count the number of times it made me try again despite the photo being ok and in line with the instructions

After I updated the app I can't open it again for a reason, it needs to turn off 'developer options' and 'unknown sources' which is doesn't really make sense, in my opinion. Like dawg, what's the connection? These settings are necessary for my device to be always turned on, I wouldn't risk to turn it off for this non sense. This app is getting worse.

This app keeps missing itself from my phone. When checking in playstore, it says un install so it is in my phone but nowhere to be found. I ended up unstalling and reinstalling the app. This happens a lot now. Not sure whats wrong with the app after all the updates. Hassle since its one of the main app im using for most of my transactions. Hope you fix this issue!

Tried to get verified 2 times. I'm still not even semi-verified after about 2-3 months of waiting. Also, it keeps on giving me a pop-up with the message 'face not detected', when my face is clearly there on the ID. Getting verified is too much of a hassle, too. I'm probably not going to use this app, not when this is so hard to even just get verification from.

This app requires a Smart phone that has a high quality camera. I tried to verify my account many times but the message always says the the photo that I submitted was not clear. My sister has the same problem with her account, maybe you can change the minimum resolution requirements of the users input(photo) so that low level/entry level smartphones users can fully verified their account.

The app keeps on closing claiming my device is not secure, I've already tried all means to get it fixed. Enabled downloads from unknown sources and turning off developer options, nothing works. It's very frustrating, this wasn't an issue until the latest updates. I can't even use the app anymore, better to just uninstall it and look for a better app.

EDIT: Still disappears, and now throws errors if you don't provide all permissions it "needs" even though some are NOT needed for a finance app. Also says device is unsecured even though unrooted. Takes a long time to load, because it needs to load a ton of bloat on startup. Uses Deceptive Patterns such as suddenly showing a whole-page of ad on startup that can cause users to click on ad when in a hurry. Throws in also a freaking tutorial every single time even if you have years using the app.

I've been using this app for years. No hassle. Just this mid October it greatly pisses me off. It wouldn't even respond to submitted tickets and calls. Just like that, it messes up with my transactions directly from the app. It suddenly wouldn't allow me to transact anything even go to help center from within the app. 'Cant cash in or send money. It's saying my device isn't secure. I've checked. My device isn't rooted and my developer's option is closed. Other apps safe. No new installed apps.

New issue... Why does it keep on kicking me out "because my device is not secure", I did a complete check with my applications and permissions, there's no privacy issue/s yet it keeps on kicking me out. I'll just switch to Maya cause this keeps getting worst ever update. Been using this since 2018-ish but this is where I loose all my patience. It's been 2 months since this started. Disappointing

Fix your device security joke! It is inconvenient to access my account that it is easier to withdraw all my funds from your app. Unlike with other apps, you cannot afford to enhance your security without doing this crazy move. Not all users are techy persons to the point that you would have to let them tweak several phone settings just to get to "use" your app. Lame

Please remove the security feature where you need to unable some setting like developer options and unknown source installations. It is very frustrating where you go through your settings and unable these settings. My phone needs to restart whenever I unable developer options. There might be ways to make it so it is not this kind of feature. IT IS VERY FRUSTRATING.

i've been really patient with your system errors, but this same problem has been going on for months now, and you still havent fixed it yet? if you want to put a filter to detect jailbroken and rooted devices, thats fine. but please dont make this difficult for us users as well. we cant even make transactions because your system kept on bugging.

Completely unusable. Would say that device is not secure even though developer options AND install unknown sources are turned off. It was fine an hour before. Aside from that, when I do manage to be able to get in the app, I cannot send money anyway because I do not receive an OTP code for some reason, even though my signal is fine. It's such a shame Maya isn't as widely available, since their system is clearly better. Update: the OTP codes arrived around 10 minutes later, which is not good.

I can't access the app because it's nowhere to be found in my home screen and in my app menu. I've seen the reviews that has the same concern as mine, most of them are a long time ago and it's still a concern now. What are you doing, developer? Fix this concern. Edited: It happened again. I have to reinstall it again. When will this issue be fixed? It's such a hussle.

The app again disappeared from my phone! This is the 2nd time and it is extremely frustrating. I had to uninstall it and reinstall so I can open it, then after closing the app it vanished again from my phone even if it says in playstore that it is installed and no "open" button!!! Ridiculous.

Has a lot of bugs, doesn't always notifies if they will have a maintenance so you might not be able to use the wallet when you need to. Sometimes sending and receiving money doesn't work and it logs you out for some reason after the recent update. After the new updates the app has gotten more unstable and I can't even send money The help and submit a ticket function is useless since it doesn't have an option for my issue and concern and won't let me submit a ticket.

Not user friendly, so many bad experience from this app. It says 'not secure' after installing the update. Followed all troubleshooting steps but still can't access my account. Accessing the triggers negative vibe when u only wanted to pay the bills on time. Every month it ask to update. Too.much memory neede for this app that is always lagging and with issues all the time

It is helpful in bank transfer and others,however it consumes most of my time just to open this app, unlike before even you dont have android phones just keypad (just dialing *143#) you can transfer money faster and buy load but now you need to have data inorder to open this waste of time app. Before when you buy load on globe there's discount and for other networks there's no charges but now there's charge. Their services is getting worst.

I've been stuck in the selfie verification for days now even though my device is all good. It won't let me log in as it keeps saying "error." That's why I can't use it. I know you want extra security but at least make it where verification won't be a hassle, fast, and without any error!!!!!

I did nothing, but after the update, and the application is installed long ago, and i didn't encounter this problem before. But now I can't get it open. The trouble of uninstalling and reinstalling is unreasonable; this application is supposed to provide seamless transactions. The problem i encountered: The app is missing on my apps, if i check on my applications, it's installed. But i can't find the "Open" and it's not disabled or something, and in playstore only "Uninstall" button is there.

Lot's of bugs and maintenance and the maintenance doesn't even change anything from the app, it's still buggy and laggy as usual, plus the app keeps disappear from my home screen. Another concern was the money inside the app. I get to wait until the maintenance was finished to finally be able to open the app, but the maintenance are very often it's unpredictable to when you may open the app for cash outs. Not very recommended for emergencies.

I have been using this app for years and it was very convenient for me since i am the one in-charge of paying our household bills untill recently. Hence the 1 star rating. Without any fuss the app just stopped working. I got a notification that i should disable the developer thing with my samsung phone. I did but the app keeps on crashing. I cant ise it anymore. I dont know what they did but please fix the damn thing!.

I rarely give a bad review but this is too much gcash... The app keeps on disappearing whenever I'm in a middle of transaction. The app suddenly disappeared after i abruptly close the app after initiating barcode scan. It also disappeared one time when I was trying to buy a load and i closed it because my connection was very slow and the app won't load properly. It also keeps on saying I have successfully linked a new device everytime I reinstall the app even though it's just the same phone.

The UX is so bad. There are always prompts recently that my device is unsecured even though this does not happen years back. The tutorial of how to use the app always pops up at the most inconvenient times as well even if I am an old user of GCash. Lastly, my linked bank account keeps becoming unlinked for some reason.

replyContent:
Hi Alvaro,

We're sorry to hear about your concern.

Please email us at support@gcash.com so we can prioritize this. Kindly include your GCash mobile number, Google Play username, and the details of your concern in the email.


Thanks!

content: The same thing that has happened 3 months ago has been happening today. The gcash app suddenly disappeared, as in unclickable to the phone. It also crashed the first time then the scenario happened. Please fix it as soon as possible ðŸ˜­

replyContent:
Hi Alvaro,

We're sorry to hear about your concern.

Please email us at support@gcash.com so we can prioritize this. Kindly include your GCash mobile number, Google Play username, and the details of your concern in the email.


Thanks!

content: The same thing that has happened 3 months ago has been happening today. The gcash app suddenly disappeared, as in unclickable to the phone. It also crashed the first time then the scenario happened. Please fix it as soon as possible ðŸ˜­

Hello admins and developer, I want to address an issue regarding to your system/app which keeps disappearing whenever I open your gcash app. Why is it like that? I invested my time and trust to this app. I have put my money here and yet I can't use it because of this problem. Not just me but many users also experienced the same problem. I noticed that they been experiencing this kind of problem since last 2months ago, I just experienced it now. Why is this problem not yet fixed? Please fix it.

What's happening with this app? It keeps on disappearing on my app drawer. I even tried to reinstall it on my browser but nothing happened. The only option it has in playstore is uninstall. I hope they can fix it as soon as possible Coz it's very inconvenient.

This current update has very much disappointed me on how this was handled, I have had developer mode open pretty much since I have received my phone seven years ago. I know I still use Android 8, and having an older phone will definitely affect my experience, but so far everything frustrates me to a disturbing degree. I'll give it two stars since I can still work with it, but this disturbs me that Gcash is willing to just other a group of power users who want to make the most out of their phone.

For the most part GCash works although a bit clunky sometimes. However I have set to biometric login and it always fails the first time if I don't put my finger on the reader. Maybe it should ask you to put your finger on the reader before failing a login? Then when it opens it has some ads I never care to see but the only way to get rid of them is to click on "remind me later". A better option would be never remind me again!

Suddenly went missing again (this is the 2nd time). Although finding it in the settings to uninstall and reinstall solved the issue, it's such a hassle. What if I were to use It for emergency? I would need to locate it in settings to uninstall and wait for download to reinstall. It often crashes too and has login issues. It it's some other apps, I wouldn't mind that much. But it's a finance app, meaning it's made for convenience and security. And please consider the anxiety it causes.

Honestly, everytime I open the app it always pops up that there is no connection, or phone is not secure. Please just tell there is an update or what it meant by "phone is not secured." Because I have double pin so how? On contrary app lags a lot, it is good in a way to save and use for online transactions but I hope the system bugs will get fixed too.

The app itself is not flexible for someone who has a phone that has LCD burn. It's hard to press buttons, it should be flexible enough that even when you tilt it follows so that you can you press sent buttons, like when you send to gcash to gcash it requires you to click the tiny check button on the corner and you can't press it, it does not tilt. Ask your front end developer to do so, instead of adding new features, focus on the those features that needs improvements. Matsalam!

It's good that you can have an e-wallet. However, it is not advisable to use all the time. First, "update" is prevalent. You can't proceed to the main features of the app because it keeps telling you to update. Second, you can't use this when you have or the area you're currently at has poor reception. You can't open the app nor do some transaction. You'll get piss because it works slowly. You'll just get embarass to the next person in line. Hope they'll make it convenient for the users soon.

Over all this app is very usefull especially in doing fast and cashless transaction, the only thing that i dislike the most is the interference of the updates on which i can't use the app if it is not updated to its newest version which is a hassle at times when you are really in need to pay or send someone money online but still needed to wait for a bit of time, this can be a trouble when someone has very limited internet and was needed to send or pay something as of the moment.

The app is useful when it's working. But there are many things that need optimization in its UI. For example, I have two MERALCO accounts in my name, yet I can only pay one at a timeâ€”it perceives my 2nd input as a duplicate of the previous one. I have to wait around an hour or two to make another transaction, and it's inconsistent. Quite annoying. Another one is that the app force-closes when I have developer options and unknown sources enabled, which I use to enhance my phone's functionality.

It's great, love the addition of the card and other features. It's very helpful and I use it a lot. It does, however, have it's flaws; it's a little slow when loading so it becomes tedious getting to one function to another. Aside from that, another thing I'm disappointed about is the fact I no longer receive a text message when I receive money from someone, I liked that notification function because with or without internet I'd know I received money. So, please return that feature.

Recently, whenever I use this app it's automatically log out and telling that my phone is "not secure". It keeps showing whenever I use the app for transactions. Also, the inbox, there's a time that it didn't show and some of the features didn't work properly. Then the app, always updating and there's no new at all. No new features or whatsoever..

I recently had a frustrating experience with this app,it mysteriously disappeared from my phone without me uninstalling it. Even worse, when I tried to reinstall it, the app kept crashing repeatedly. This was incredibly frustrating as I relied on it for various transactions. I hope the developers address these issues and provide a more stable user experience in the future.

Gcash is one of my favorite money transfer or banking service (aside from Maya) as it has a debit/credit system that can be done online for easy access and transaction. The app on itself is very inconvenient as it crashes on the first opening of the app frequently. I've tried clearing cache, reinstalling, check for updates, many times, yet the problem persists. I may recommend optimizing the app for low-end devices.

Constant updates that barely do anything and only end up inconveniencing people trying to use it at the worst possible times because we can't use the app when it's not up to date. App always has this strange error when trying to open it up which can be annoying and time consuming. Account verification is a hassle and it seems they cannot recognise official printed e-ID.

Hate to say. But it is very frustrating to experience the constant app crash, disappearing of the app, not able to access the app for unknown reason and to always install and uninstall for it to work again. For the App design. I'd prefer the simple GCash Logo rather having it to change on every season. That's all I can say. Please fix this issue. This is causing anxiety for both me and other people who's using this app for financial transactions

Been using this for years and I have been verified since day 1. However, I suddenly received a message that I am now unverified, making me unable to access some important features such as but not limited to gcredit, ggives etc. I submitted, multiple times, different valid IDs but nothing happened over the months. It was rather very disappointing.

My only complaint is that it restricts user from enabling developer options to use the app. There might be a way to make transactions secure regardless of the option being enable/desabled. I use these options to make sure that the music I play (via Bluetooth) does not have a silence in between each song. w/c is annoying for me I have not seen any workaround for this outside of the developer options. I have this will be reconsidered for these using developer options without bad intentions.

Please fix the problem with your app. I can't use it the way I am using it before. There's always a message popping up before i even type my password. It always says that "our system detected that the device you are using is not secure. For your protection, this app will now be close." At it will give a link where I can fix it. But unfortunately, i cant fix the problem with the link provided. You updated the app for two times in a week but the problem in your app is still there!

Always have an update which are very helpful, yes. But, for some it can be a hussle. Especially the people who has to access it anytime, we would have to update first before using (it can be frustrating to update everytime). Although performance is good, its quite slow on processing...which takes up your time.

The same issue with other user. App is disappearing after several time using it. I really witness how the app vanished! Please fix, it is very inconvenient to install it everytime I need to use it. Thanks. Been a user for how many years and I am very satisfied. 4 stars for now. Addition: Cannot locate the app, even in playstore no option to OPEN it. Very inconvenient.

Actually it is a good app but most of the time its so annoying how it has so many tutorials etc...it would be better if you fix it and make it simple and easy to use..thank youðŸ˜Š Well lately your app is always updating,its so annoying cause you keep updating but still its not working really well,it keeps logging and some other issues..so dissapointingðŸ˜”

UPDATE 12/3 I got a rebate but I don't know from what. It covers the Spotify trouble though so I added a star. Thought I'll never recover my money. Thanks 11/24 Spotify's able to deduct 5x fr mo GCash acct (who knows how much more if I didn't cancel my subscription)â€”2x yesterday+3x today. Definitely there's a problem w Google Play subscription but also w this app because a payment set only once was able to deduct multiple times. The customer service confirmed that Spotify did make the deductions

Always receiving an error everytime I log in. Recently, it just disappeared but managing my apps, it shows that it is not uninstalled. To resolve, I tried to uninstall ans reinstall the app. It just became worse as it is giving me internal server error. All the troubleshooting steps available are not helpful. Now, still can't use the app.

If the app doesn't work, make sure to TURN OFF the following: -Install unknown apps -Developer Options This might help because that's what the prompt said when it appeared in less than a second. I needed to open the app many times to read all the information, and it worked. I felt nervous due to this issue, and I can't read the prompt properly, so I'm giving 3 stars. It's not bad but needs improvement for the prompt. Moreover, I am grateful for the services Gcash provided. God bless. :)

The app is great because of its convenience. It makes the act of paying for different stuff easier. However, the log-in process has been slower than a lot of banking apps lately (Metrobank is even faster which says a lot). I also found it odd that I couldn't buy load for myself and other people.

Sometimes the GCash App is missing and I need to uninstall and install it again. Its pretty annoying when you are about to pay something then suddenly GCash is missing in my phone. Specially if the I go outside and the signal might be bad, downloading GCash all over again would irritate me and create inconvenience to other people. What's also annoying is when the app is installed again, the tutorial is enabled which also takes time. Overall the app is slow nowadays. Please optimize your app.

I can't open the damn app. I had a smooth transaction last night and then suddenly, I can't open it today because of "Device security" or something. I haven't done anything to my phone. Why are there always bugs like this in your system. Fix it.

My experience is quite okay but sometimes if doesn't work and always says that i dont have an internet connection And also the updating system is kinda annoying like everytime i have to use it/every week, i always have to update the app but after updating it u didn't even know what's new on the app. Can't u just update the software all at once.

We can't copy paste all the time and of course can't memorize the numbers everytime. You're supposed to make this easier, not harder. Fix this and I'll change my rating.

Unable to make transactions, despite the fact that I already did the things they have in guides about how to fix this issues it still doesn't work updated the app, clear cache,close and open it NOTHING of those worked and the worst part is it keeps saying unable to make transaction without the words "temporary" or "at the moment" so i wouldn't know when would I'll be able to make transaction again.

Overall its very helpful and easy to use. For instance run out of data, paying bills and etc. there's something i could concern about it always kept updating every week i think or months. Can you fix this out for us to use it as easy as we open this application.

This app is so useful for saving your money.but it always update 2 months to 2 months again it's annoying and when you update it the storage of this app increases I'm just saying this because what if for other phone who have low and poor storage how can they try this app?You need to fix the storage management of your app so that even low storage/poor storage phone can try this app two.But I know this app is useful but we have to share this app to other not just for those who have great storage.

This isn't kind of convenient to use anymore.. Maya is better. No joke.. What the F happened?? The updated version has a lot of misplaced ads. Ads need not be annoying. If you're paying your advertisements, don't base it on the number of clicks. The developers will place the ads where you can click them by accident. Balance your click rate with bounce rate. It'll give users a better experience and sponsors will reach their target customers. Pop-up ads with the size of the screen and making it your action button won't convert a target customer. Plain annoying and useless.

replyContent:
Hi Mary Jane! We recommend that you check your internet connection. Sometimes slow internet connection can cause users to experience log in errors.Feel free to reach us through the following official channels so we may be able to help you further:
Facebook: www.facebook.com/PayMayaCares
Twitter: www.twitter.com/paymayaofficial

replyContent:
Hi Mary Jane! We recommend that you check your internet connection. Sometimes slow internet connection can cause users to experience log in errors.Feel free to reach us through the following official channels so we may be able to help you further:
Facebook: www.facebook.com/PayMayaCares
Twitter: www.twitter.com/paymayaofficial

Always using for online payments and transactions but still not eligible for loans.
I hope maya still continue to be responsive but sometimes it has error not load right.
Why do you need to always update the app like the gcash app. Yet you can't make the app better. Instead making it better it gets worst.
It's a great app but everytime I use it, it always requests update and it's hard to open sometimes because you need to have a very strong internet connectivity first.

Worst experience ever! I used this app as mode of payment for PRC license renewal and unfortunately the transaction was unsuccessful. Very inconvenient that time. Perhaps, there was a problem with the system. I ended up for refund. Sadly, my appointment was rescheduled. I suggest improvement for more convinience and efficiency in our part as clients. Thanks.

Poor costumer service. They don't respond to my concerns regarding my account. My account is not upgraded, and supposedly I can still send money to smart padala agents, but I can't. Now I'm stuck with an account that has balance, but can't withdraw it nor send it to anyone, and only use the money to pay the bills using their app.

I've been trying to create an account but when I'm done filling up the 4 steps when I proceed it goes it didn't load right, I've tried all the steps that the help center suggested but it still the same. How can I access it.

I used it to make payments for my bills. Was satisfied until I got a (new) physical paymaya card and linked it to my account (for online shopping sana). Within minutes 90% of my balance disappeared. It was then that I learned that they don't have a hotline. Chat support was slow and didn't help at all. Still 2 stars for all the times my payment got through.
replyContent:

content: Used to love this app because of the cool features such as you can use it to pay online since this is accepted on most of the online shops like Amazon. I even use this to pay my Skype subscriptions. I just go to 7-11 to reload my account. But recently, it's a mess. All of the reloading partners listed doesn't even know what Paymaya is. On top of that, even 7-11 was removed on the list of their reloading partner. BDO as well. I'm planning to shift to other payment app if this will not be fixed.

I like the looks and overall design of the old Paymaya app. It's easy on the eyes. The new one (Maya) is poorly designed. You're UX designer did not do a good job. The choice of colors is so bad. I hope it can be improved in future updates. Edit: Please please fix the design of the app. It's very clutter and it's hard to find what I'm looking for. I always use this app and it's getting really INCONVENIENT to use. >:(

I would have given 5 stars from the previous version but this new update is just frustrating. I've always experience doing a transaction 2 times because it always gets refunded the 1st time even though I have typed the right information. It was a smooth transaction before but now it takes time to send money or load purchases before the reciever gets it.

Some of my load transactions don't have any cashbacks. Also, transaction fee refunds for using 711 (amount less than 8k) for cash in were not credited to my account. It happened twice already. Tried emailing customer service but to no avail. Main reasons why I opt to use Paymaya are because of these features, guess they really don't deliver for long.
I encountered an error When I'm trying to submit my application for loan, the apps says "it doesn't submitted right". Please fix your app

Cant logged in. Check my username and password. Its all correct. But i cant logged in. Tried resetting the password. But when I logged in again it still says error. What seems to be the problem? And pay maya doesnt have customer service.
Bad experience on customer service. Different procedures were instructed to me. It took already over a month and I still haven't gotten my balance from my deactivated account. Very dissapointing.

Please improve the credit page. I want to know more details about the money I'm borrowing, like the due date and the interest. I know it's set in advance by the user but it wouldn't hurt to be reminded before borrowing this money.
Kindly stop bombarding us with crypto notifications. For some reason I can't opt out via app. I had to block notifications on the app settings of my phone.

From 5 stars to 2 stars Maya Bank suddenly close my account and i cannot access it, i tried to contact the CS but they are too long to respond and so many questions ask, even though you already answered, still cannot access my account. I need my money back!
Nice interface but help section needs some work. Cant even direct to a real human being when asking for help. Also encountered double withdrawal and non credit of said funds.
It's a hassle to cash in: only a few bank is supported, you have to generate a code first, plus high convenience fee, difficult to find cash in outlets and last laggy customer service.
It seems the security has become lenient. NO OTP ASKED WHEN SENDING MONEY. This is simply shocking! I am starting to doubt the security of the funds in this app.

What happen to this app I can't transfer money to GCash even In my gotyme bank what happen even my account is fully Upgraded plzzz fix this issue or else I will delete this apps and support GCash or other bank plzzz fix also the issue in savings account it say savings is temporarily unavailable how we can deposite from saving if it is unavailable also gave us advisory about that because we don't know about if our money is secure when the time we need a cash

Tried to upgrade my acct 2x & both times I had to email you. The 1st time, I was informed via email that there was a system enhancement & rcvd a text msg days later that the upgrade was denied bec info didn't match (even if it clearly does). The 2nd time is still pending for more than a wk now and no feedback via email & FB Messenger for 3 days now. I tried calling the hotline but it's temporarily unavailable. Don't get me wrong, app's great in terms of payment but customer service is terrible!!

Wondering why this app eats 1gb of my storage. Gcash storage seems exponentially lower than this app. Wish maya reduce their app size. And btw when i open crypto it always go back to log in page. Like what the hell is that??

Not ideal to use for urgent bills payments especially if you're trying make the deadline as post date takes longer than usual. Customer service is useless and basically non existing as well you'll have to deal with the issues yourself. I get nervous every time I make a payment or cash in because of lags and system glitches, you'll definitely wonder at some point the funds might go missing during transaction from or into the app.

I opened an account today. It was fast but when I tried upgrading it, it kept saying my details didn't match the ID on the first try. I tried again but this time it said the ID I used which was my PRC ID was not valid. I uninstalled the app right away! Such a waste of time! I was even looking forward for this app since I thought it was promising enough compared to other online digital banks. Such a disappointment.

Interface is cluttered and ugly and any money transfer transaction charges a fee. Took away a lot of services that used to be available with a basic account and locked them behind an upgraded account. Upgrade proccess is clunky since the app has you resubmit the whole request again if they have an issue with even one (1) requirement. Good luck getting the app to accept the picture of a valid ID or the live video

content: I have a problem with this app, I couldn't receive an otp code through my number even though the connection's fine. Pls fix it, I really need the bank app now.

But after filling everything up, it said that the ID was not supported anymore. You should have removed that in the first place because it is very misleading for the people choosing that option. Or better yet, include it again.

I hate how maya keeps on notifying, and even texting, me that I have a 10 peso freebie. It was legit one time, however, now it's cap.I get it, it's a freebie, I shouldn't be mad whether I do receive one or not, and I actually don't mind not getting any, but it's just that, if there's no such thing, then don't notify me, don't make people's hopes up. It's irritating, makes me want to delete the app. Fix this or if this continues, I'll surely not use this anymore.
everytime I open the app, it's always updating. If I need the money asap, I can't get a hold of it since it needs to be updated every now and then.
You server sucks. It takes longer to load the app.

The app itself is great. The reason I gave 2 stars is beacuse of their CUSTOMER SUPPORT, they simply suck! More than a year ago my phone was stolen and I couldn't access my account since I can't enter the OTP that was sent to my phone number, the one that was stolen. I sent an email to their customer support stating my problem and all I get was an automated response but there was no follow up from them. So I made a 2nd acc. I have a recent issue with it, sent a new email BUT STILL NO RESPONSE!
in general, i have no problem BUT WHY THE H3CK MY INBOX WONT LOAD!! I CANT SEE ANY NOTIFICATION/UPDATE!!! WTH
I have an issue now... when i transfer money to bank the otp will receive my number is too delay almost 8 hrs to receive very disappointed....
when i update it i can't open my account it always says reload

This is why I rarely use this app for payment. Lot of issues and sometimes unresponsive, I cashed in and it didn't credited or reflected into my PayMaya Account. Though the service and rates are better than the popular app like this (Gcash). It is inconvenient though, due to a lot of bugs, error in their system, etc. I missed my due date on paying bills. Hopefully my issue will be resolved soon.

A friend of mine persuaded me to give this app a try. And I must say your id verification process SUCKS big time. I tried to upgrade my account using both my PRC license and passport. When it comes to the back part, the prompt suddenly says no id detected. Like why? I was able to capture the front part just fine. Instead of being convenient, this app just becomes a hassle. Time to resolve the consumers' concerns, PayMaya... PS. Got verified already. Got problems with loading other people though.

I don't know what's happening with Maya lately but I have been having multiple issues with this app. The latest one is there is an issue with the sending of OTPs thru texts whenever you do bank transfers. Good app. Extremely limited in terms of international transactions. That's pretty much it. I use Maya for international transactions due to its virtual card features but it's horrible. Reduced to 2 stars after my bill payment didn't push through even though it got deducted from my balance. Be careful when paying and always screenshot receipts. I can't fully trust the app anymore which is unfortunate since I use it the most.

Good and convenient, but I hate how it forces you to update the app. I have had occasions where I needed to pay for my bill, but find my app un-updated and unable to pay for bills. Updates should be optional and not a gatekeeping requirement to use the app.

"chat with experts" but all you get is a bot. ðŸ¤¦ I also keep having load issues on a daily basis. There are days like I've had 5 consecutive attempts to buy load. It would supposedly go through then a minute later gets refunded. Imagine the frustration of having to do multiple attempts just to by load and nothing's working. Goodness!! ðŸ¤¦

Struggle to login via biometrics or PIN, need to type the password manually. RESTARTED the app and my phone as well but still the same problem in logging in via biometrics or PIN. Though I have no issues on bank apps in logging in through biometrics/PIN, only on MAYA APP! Additionally, it's difficult to purchase a load on this app. It always say: "Something went wrong. Uh oh looks like you've a slow internet connection" I have a 5G signal. Youtube, Spotify, bank apps were fast though.

Promotions OVER Responsiveness ðŸ‘ŽðŸ½ðŸ‘ŽðŸ½ Last few updates are taxing the app's crucial responsiveness just to display promotional ads making it less reliable at times when you need it the most. It is my first time using this app but sad to say it's really hard to verify the account they always keep saying that please re-enter the city with maximum of 30 characters only but when I change it then the keep on saying the same thing. I don't get it. I give my exact address tho.

Been really disappointed in this app. After all those year of updating and they forgot to include focus on their app camera. And how could we upload IDs then? If you won't fix that just import a choices wherein the user can instead use gallery to upload its ID for documentation.

Not ideal to use for urgent bills payments especially if you're trying make the deadline as post date takes longer than usual. Customer service is useless and basically non existing as well you'll have to deal with the issues yourself. I get nervous every time I make a payment or cash in because of lags and system glitches, you'll definitely wonder at some point the funds might go missing during transaction from or into the app.

I opened an account today. It was fast but when I tried upgrading it, it kept saying my details didn't match the ID on the first try. I tried again but this time it said the ID I used which was my PRC ID was not valid. I uninstalled the app right away! Such a waste of time! I was even looking forward for this app since I thought it was promising enough compared to other online digital banks. Such a disappointment.

Interface is cluttered and ugly and any money transfer transaction charges a fee. Took away a lot of services that used to be available with a basic account and locked them behind an upgraded account. Upgrade proccess is clunky since the app has you resubmit the whole request again if they have an issue with even one (1) requirement. Good luck getting the app to accept the picture of a valid ID or the live video
replyContent:
