They keep on saying that mybaccount is all good no restriction,how come i cant send money,i cant recieve money,i cant withdraw using the link physical card. Cant transfer the credit

I transferred money from my debit to maya but Maya didn't receive the said amount luckily it was credited back to my debit. In my 2nd attempt of transfer, the amount i sent didn't get into my maya account again and this time the amount was not returned back on my debit. Chat support is not working. Hassle of transferring money. Transaction only has to be until 3pm but funds to be credited at 11pm. Its not useful for emergency transactions.
This app don't responed in secured encrypted VPN connection. While other apps like games respond well.

My old phone got stolen and I created another Maya acct with my new one. Its sad since I can no longer link my credit card to the new acct due to your policy or restrictions or whatsoever. Well, 3 stars for now even though your customer service is great. If you'll be having like an unlink credit card option, I could've rate 5 stars. just sayin

Please optimize your app!! So quick to transfer to e-wallet, but transfers from wallet to other savings accounts/banks always error. I transferred from my maya savings to my e-wallet, but the amount didn't reflect on my wallet. Please fix your app.
Loading time is taking so long. I need to clear the cache and data to be able to log-in again.
why the video cam is dark, useless. I can't take a photo for profile application. fix that asap ..
Need to improve when opening crypto wallet. The rest is fine.
can't scroll transaction list. Please fix this ASAP.

Ads or popups appearing while filling out details. While typing, a popup would suddenly flash on your screen, by chance you would accidentally press it. Once you've pressed it, you are redirected to another page. Once you've gone back to the page where you were filling out the details, all the details have disappeared. Thus, you have to repeat the process. Seriously? Who was the genius who designed this? Though, even with this flaw, it is still a handy app.

Whenever I try to upgrade my account, I encounter the error "slow internet connection" which hinders me to submit my registration for upgrade. If you want your consumers to upgrade, please fix this bug. It's annoying. Btw, I have fast internet connection, 4G+. UPDATE: The app requires "WIFI connection" when trying to upgrade account. It won't work if you only use data as your connection.
I was trying to scan my ID, your app camera won't focus. I gave up.

"Almost okay" PLEASE READ DEVELOPERS. I can say that paymaya may be the best e-money app ever. But the loading system is hard to access, when you will accumulate load from TM, you will have to find it in the bottom of the list. I suggest is make it automatic, if the number is encoded, then the system should automatically know what network it is, and just list the promos available for them.

I would have given this app 5 stars if it has the following: 1. Easier prepaid loading interface (It's confusing to scroll through all of the load options that are not applicable to all mobile networks. Let users filter the choices by telco or better yet, automatically filter it based on mobile number input) 2. Wider range of billers/merchants 3. Ability to export the historical transactions as csv/spreadsheet or PDF. It's time to re-work the app as it's already trailing behind the competition.
replyContent: Thank you for your awesome suggestions, Red! We're always working on improving our app so we'll definitely take note of those. ðŸ˜Š

content: In terms of app performance, this is better than most e-wallets. Service-wise, not so much. A lot of people have been complaining about missing gaming pins and customer support doesn't even try and do anything. Customer support is essentially non-existent. Everything else is pretty good just don't buy any gaming pins here the risk of it getting lost is pretty high.

If your update is like with GCASH to turn off developer options so that you can monitor and limit our spending I would gladly delete my account with you. I will not turn off my developer options. My device is more secure with it enabled.

I have waste plenty of money now loading in maya but in 1 second it expired immediately like what...i try it in gcash it work perfectly well like what's wrong with this app it's really helpful indeed but it need a fix.

Update: Concern has been resolved. Thanks. A log in error appears saying dat paymaya requires addl info from me. Emailed u, and u r asking for addl info wc I answered immediately. Been 16 days but still no reply. Emailed u couple of times to no reply. I appreciate if u could gve an update if i wud wit for a year or a decade.
Slow, when opening the app, when updating the amount compared to other apps.

Happen to use this app. It's very convinient having a virtual credit card, but after some few updates, it now forces you to upgrade your account to be able to use the damn virtual credit card. Good thing I didn't load money into it, it'll just collect dust in there. You only have one lame option to use it, and it's to buy loads and etc. I don't really need to buy load. I just wanted to use a credit card to buy something in e-bay. It's very frustrating.

-What's happening in the app right now. Cash-in / add money through online banking is frustrating. Previously, it has been just speed. The bank successfully sent it in real-time transaction, but I had to wait for it two days before I could receive it. It's scary, especially since it's money. Plus, It is really frustrating to always request the code for OTP. The OTPs were sent a few hours later. Very inconvenient especially during emergencies. Please, you need to fix this.
Interest rate for Maya's credit are too high. For a grand, you'll be paying like 18.5% with service fee included. I love using Maya though but... yeah ðŸ˜ª
It has always been good and efficient, but now, I didn't receive my cash in, which is such a shame.

For those paymaya users who have the difficulty to log in try this solution. Many times also i found it hard to log in... It says that the server is not responding or the app needs to be updated; though it is already up to date. What i did? I just go to the settings of my phone and set the time and date setting to AUTOMATIC. And tada! I was already able to log in. I hope this is helpful and effective for you. Thanks.
it hangs. A bit buggy. it gets scary sometimes using this app
Please fix the issue with Infinix Zero 30 5G unit. Everytime the app logouts I will have to request OTP to login again.
I used to love using Maya but when you have to contact sa customer service.. they're soo unresponsive. it takes dayssss for them to reply but saying the same script for your follow ups

Finally decided to get PayMaya for the first time. Was initially impressed with how clean the UI is compared to other services. Then I attempted to upgrade my account. It was pending yesterday but now, there's no clear indication whether my request has failed or still pending. No message or notification.. It also loads so much slower than the "other" service. And while I greatly appreciate the security measures, it's tedious to keep having to log-in every 5 minutes or so.

I use this mainly to purchase prepaid credits for my phone, and to pay for online transactions (Grab, gaming) since this has a virtual visa card. You'll need to upgrade your account (for free) to get a physical card. I gave it 3 stars because I cannot use the virtual visa to pay for what I buy in Shopee and error messages pop up whenever I try to load up my pocket wifi. Recently, I could not top up my account because the loading system is down.

The app is useful however when I tried upgrading, it wouldn't recognize the photo of my driver's license. It says it isn't valid, but I made sure the photo was clear and that name and address match the info registered. Also, I've recently had to change my phone number coz I had to switch to a different network that works better in the area I moved to. However, when I click on settings, it doesn't give me an option to change my mobile number.

There are several problems related to international transfers and it may take 1-2 weeks to receive funds from overseas transactions. While the customer service is commendable, they tend to sugarcoat the issues and give you false hopes that are not followed by concrete solutions to the problem.
Why can't I pass the face authentication? How many times did I perform it, but still fails.
Needs a little more upgrade in the user interface
Keep sending 10 free voucher, but nothing inside when you open it. Also i paid 250 for card hoping to get cashback but to no avail. So upset about it. Dismayed
I think trading crypto is to high charge I want to have maya own trading platform not on pdax it is very high charge not on time very slow
My first time to use Maya for load. so happy, very fast. thanks Mayaâ˜ºï¸â˜ºï¸
Delayed transfer , it takes more days to wait. Hussle use this apps

The app is all good and everything. Used this to buy things online. Their customer support is slow though. Have been trying to deactivate a duplicate account linked to my lost phone number. Already called and verified by them as the owner in the process of deactivating the lost account. It's been days and I can't put any amount in my new account because the duplicate is still there. ðŸ˜©

Hope more merchants available on PayBills. Especially bdo and citibank credit cards. Also it would've been better if they have an option to link bank accounts and your billing info on PayBills so that I don't have to enter the same information every now and then. Overall app is very user friendly, valuable cashbacks and promos. And upgrading account is easy. Sad there will be service charge on bank transfer soon. Hopefully they'll waive it again.

Paymaya has been so bad lately. Can't buy load on it and everytime I try to put money in it's always transaction failed. Ik it's not my bank's problem because I was able to transfer money into other banks and e-wallets. Paymaya pls fix your sht!

I always have an issue with regards to cashing in via Bank account specially BPI. it will give you payment failed even before sending the OTP to proceed but overall no issues on other services. I'll change this rating once the cash in via bank does not have issue anymore.

I can't upgrade my profile from basic to fully verified because of one thing. I hate that I can't use my school ID as my valid ID even though I'm already an adult. Please add it as one of the options.
Keep mentioning it's free to cash in BDO but service isn't available been keep trying but I still no changes! You advertise free but can't even use that platform. Very frustrating
Would love to use this as a main e-money app, but the thing is, the load promos available per network in Maya leaves much to be desired. I hope you can do something about this.
Very slow. It took me more than 10 min to buy a load using Smart app then using Maya as payment method. The verification process took so long.
have been using this app for years and Always felt that it was reliable. As of now, I can even access money I placed in the savings because of how slow everything is.

new OTP taking too long to send and everytime i click resend i receive the previous OTP after 30 sec of resending it and the new otp doesn't still send evem after 5mns if i don't click the resend button
The app is a bit laggy and delay. I'm doing the mission and I already did the step and somehow it takes time to update the mission.
Hi. I had loaded my wallet just now and cant see the amount reflected on my wallet. Was there something wrong? Its still not on it. Pls help. Its for billing for the monthly dues of the staffs
I keep redirecting to a lot of pages when cashing in and I still need to scroll and look for my bank manually in a long list when doing bank transfer.

The app is great... I am having problem with sending otp when sending money, its a headache of delay.. It took so much time when sending or paying... I have no prob with otp with my other payment options though...

I like the new look of the services we can get from the app, specially when buying load. Also like the slide feature for more secured transaction. I just noticed that it takes too much time to finish a transaction, It keeps on loading. thankfully, we receive notif every transaction telling us that the transaction was a success. I just close the app forcely so I can do again another transaction. It's a little annoying but I can't do anything about it. Hope you can fix it soon. Kudos to the team.

Simple and Useful! But lately i've been experiencing a bug where I use my lockscreen to open my Paymaya account. It goes to a never ending loop; once I entered my lockscreen pass, it will show another lockscreen prompt. Hopefully it'll get fixed soon :) Still, great app! Update: I changed it to 3 stars for one reason only, sluggish customer service. It's been more than a week and I still got no replies to my email. The app is very convenient yet the customer service drags it down a little bit.
replyContent: Thank you for the great feedback, Jeanne! Thank you for the heads up as well on your issue. We'll take note of this and get it fixed as soon as possible! ðŸ˜‰

content: It does what it is suppose to do. What I don't like about the app are: 1. You need to manually claim the cashback thru voucher (before it was automatically credited). 2. prepaid load. Sometimes, it shows error message while buying load but actually processed successfully. 3. barcode scanner can't read meralco reference number. 4. List of prepaid load is not categorized. Scrolling down is annoying.

The app is great. No doubt. It is works like a credit card but loadable at your own risk/control. But the issue with their service, like the other companies or bank or what not with poor service. Especially if you already escalated it to them and it will take for a long before your issue got resolve. And this is about your own money stored in their app but their app or system screw up.
App has been great so far but we need a website for maya. The app is not working ag some point. Please consider creating web based login option.

To the devs: When I click on Savings > Deposit > Select Fund Source > Copy Account Number, the copied value has spaces in it. I have to manually remove the spaces before I can use it. It would be better if the copied value didn't have spaces. Also, I never got my cashback for the Maya card even if I completed all the steps in the Mission. The steps also never got updated despite me finishing all of them one by one. Obviously there's a bug going on there. Oh well.
Convenient. Experiencing delays here and there though.
Why I cannot log in, it says there our app ran into error?????

I absolutely love Paymaya. However, when it started to update it features and stuffs, I can no longer log-in in the platform. It would always says, "update" when I already updated the app. Until now, I got the problem unfix so I decided to uninstall the app and reinstall it for the hope I'll be able to have access again. Hope this would be fix soonest.

I think, one of the reasons why other people stick to GC*** is because of their credibility. When they said you'll get this coupon, or cashback, they'll give it to you and you won't be stressed about it. Even now that they offer less promos, users already trust them so they don't switch. While this app, offers quite a lot of promos but you don't really receive the cashbacks. Its very inconsistent, and when that happens, normally I would stop using it 'til the next month. Is system the problem?

It needs improvement. Lots of improvements. Maybe, about the number? I mean, please add an option to add another back-up phone number. Just incase the the # we input during registration is no longer available due to sim expiration. It's too much hassle if that happens. That's all, the other service is in pretty good shape :>
it's easy to use although I am not fully verified,I hope it has TIN ID would be included for verifying Maya acct..
disappointed about the load, there's no globe prepaid wifi load not like before

Good app but when you transact large amount of money either transfering from savings to wallet, the apps loads very long. Also, i didn't get the OTP confirmation request when transferring from savings to wallet. I think transferring from savings to wallet should have OTP before the amount will be tranferred. Also, I think its a good idea if you can set a limit on how much you can withdraw from your savings account for another security purpose.
I don't like the fee when I cash in even though it's only 100peso they still demand 2percent fee

Sometimes there's a problem with the load. Because I'm using this app to purchase load for my customers. The load is coming but they can't use it for call or text even if the load promo, number, and the network is correct. Or even sometimes, the load is not really coming but it's already deducted to my balance. All in all, the app is safe for money and easy to use to other transactions. Only this matter regarding the load I'm encountering and I've received complaints to some customers already.
Your OTP sending is totally disappointing! Fix it or you might just as well tell us to use another similar platform.

This is a good app not going to lie. The design is great, the mobility is great,and the places you can load are also great. I just wish they would bring back the feature where you could use the app offline. Because sometimes stores dont have internet and I dont always have money for data and the likes so reviving that feature is a must

Great app, tho it's often slow and can't register a promo on a perfectly fine numbers sometimes for some reason. As i said it's often slow and this what's annoys me the most, that's why the 3 stars. Edit: the app's been awful once again, i can't even get into the maun screen often times. When i'm just about to register a load, it brings me back to the lock screen? Like what? It makes me so angry and frustated.
replyContent:
Hi Joash! Thanks for your feedback. For us to help you on this further, please do share with us more details about your experience. You may reach us through the following official channels:
Facebook: www.facebook.com/PayMayaCares
Twitter: www.twitter.com/paymayaofficial
Hotline: (+632) 8845-77-88 (Toll Free: 1800-1084-57788) or *788

content: Maya has been a difficult app to use ever since it's release. It really needs a lot of improvements in the customer support sector. Before recovering my account I encountered alot of issues from Misinformation from Agents and unhelpful directions from ignorant Support agents. In the end, Maya Escalations support was the best but it was far from easy and goes to show the lack of professionalism within some of the customer agents. 3/5 for now since I believe in the app's potential.
so far it worked paying electric bills...we will see if this is better than other apps I am used to using ðŸ˜

It was good before but after the update, buying load took too long and if you accidentally pressed the green bar while it's loading it'll buy that same load again without asking for permission and deduct it to your wallet automatically. Also before, if you click on load, you'll see the networks immediately but now you'll be directed to shops and have to scroll for the network.
It's ok, the Load part needs to have a custom regular load

Somehow I understand that they lowered their interest rates but I don't like the savings boost interest right now. I'm expecting to boost my interest rates and there is no way that it restart or even recognize the completed tasks like bills/shopping payments I made. Payment is not rewarding anymore. Also tone down on pop up ads and promotions when starting the app. It is annoying. After closing an ad another one pops up.

Last month or two and just now, I'm having repeated error login just like everyone else. That I need to clear apps data or need to reinstall Maya on my Samsung Android 11. Please speed up or remove unnecessary animation. And please speed up process of saving receipt, make it 1 click save. Maybe you can add instant SAVE RECEIPT botton, and separate SHARE botton. Over all Maya has excellent service. Just need more app re modification.

Maya! Please! Kindly fix it! I can't log in! It's really good that's why i transferred here... but i started seeing technical difficulties... I can't even log in right now, earlier there's a transaction error... just when there's an emergency with sending my money to my friend... haizz.. but i understand that maya is trying their best to fix these technical difficulties. I hope it can be fixed soon.

I tried to change my number and was successful in doing so, after I changed my number, all I have to do is uninstall & install the app again just to log in on the app. It's a hassle, I tried to change my password but still with the same error. How do I fix this? I can't even do bank transfer online lagi nagcacrash yung app. Can't even connect with their customer service.

Maya/PayMaya is a promising app with potential for improvement. Optimizing RAM usage and smoother multitasking could enhance user experience. Adding a dark mode would make the app visually appealing and easier for users with darker backgrounds.

Not the best when used for online shopping (which i do a lot) because of their refund/return system which takes them 1-3 days to process and takes 45-200 days if you file a dispute, wouldnt recommend for big purchases although i pay my bills with this app and its easy to be approved on maya credit. In the beginning there's a lot of ways to gain vouchers but even when i pay bills and recommend it to friends i never get a voucher for referring people to get on the app no cashback on bills.

I've been trying to upgrade my account for days now and have done everything correctly. As a foreigner I have uploaded my passport, done the video selfie and filled out all the details correctly only to receive by txt "the information you have provided is incomplete." Still waiting since yesterday for a response from customer service and need to pay an important fee online.

Update: From 2 to 3 stars! Bank Transfer feature has been added. Credit/Debit card cash in process failed in me in all four attempts. The verification process requires an actual video call. Unlike its competitor, that was pretty weird. Logging in the app is better since it can use your phones security mode (i.e. fingerprint and iris) Still needs a bit more work before it can even get a three star from me. Needs more billers enrolled, more merchant, and most importantly bank transfer.

Starting to get stale the longer I use it and I'm already regretted rating this a perfect star but yeah, been using for a long time and it is still easy but the cash in fee is starting to annoy me aswell. Please don't take too much money when I use 7-11 and atleast make me feel that your events or promotions not to be a total pre-selected, let REAL users actually win the prizes!

It was ok and transactions were smooth until one day the app does not work on my phone thus I can't log in to my account. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app but to no avail. I have to use other phones to be able to log in. Idk what's the problem, it was perfectly fine then on my phone. Now it's not working. Support doesn't respond too.
App is great but I would like to suggest if you can buy regular load like the blue app which you can type how much load you would like to buy
Customer service of this app sucks.It is always automated reply.When you request to chat with an agent it always says " there are no available agent blah blah blah"

I download Maya again because the pldt give a credit limit of 5k in MAYA in the beginning I have smooth transa ctions by using the Maya credit to transfer to wallet.it was big help if you need cash. Unfortunately the time I fully paid my credit, I can't used it anymore, I don't knew why..I pay on time or before due, I never fail to pay my due date because I want to achieve higher credit limits ..There costumer service was really hard to reach it takes hours to wait,what they said is high volume

Great way of paying my bills without having to que up in line. Hopefully theres more option like topping up more load on some mobile games. Edit: Have to rate it to 3 stars coming from 4. As I've been trying all day to add money from debit card to credit card. Its always the same error "Add money transaction failed". Tried BPI, BDO, Landbank, heck I even tried my mothers Security Bank and my sister's UCPB. Always the same. Add money transaction failed. Such a waste of time and data.

The App is fine and the initial account opening process is painless and swift. But the upgrade process is a shambles as the photo taking instructions do not provide a possibility to make the photo "upright" and the face verification process is faulty and fails multiple tiimes. The face recognition algorith has problems with ID photos that have an overlay with security features. This was already a problem with Paymaya 2 years ago and they haven't fixed it

I'll rate it fair for now but I'd like to inform the developers that there's something wrong with the new update or perhaps I'm the only one experiencing it. Anyway after the update I went back to open the app but what it says is still "Update Now" and when triple checked it on the playstore the "Update now" is still on the U-interface. If there's something wrong with it I hope this'll help the app development.

What's happening right now i can't send money purchase load nothing at all is there some kind of maintenance going on??if there is then why there's no text informing us before hand??like bruh i literally use your app like my bank so at least inform use beforehand

It's okay but could use more work. Please add a feature where we can block or authorize payments that charges my account automatically. I can't keep track all of my subscriptions because sometimes I use it to pay other stuff. Adding an option to block automatic charging would've been a great help. Thanks!

Looks sleek and technical in terms of usability, but for some reason I can't get past the upgrading my account stage. Tried to put a primary ID via passport, but when I need to take a photo of it- the app keeps crashing. Have reboot and reinstalled the app several times, seems to be the same. :(

New to Maya, and at start, it was great, but then, after just less than a week of using the crypto, I can no longer access it. The interface becomes black, and it lags when I click on it. It's been 2 days since now. I want to monitor my crypto, but now, I can't. I also can't access my money on it because of the error. If this continues, I'll worry about my money. Hopefully, this will be resolved soon and I can use my money. Don't have any concern with wallet and savings. It's perfectly working.

Please try again by uploading a clear and well-lit photo of my ID, the photo of the ID is as clear as it can get coz the words are readable and if i use lights that are any brighter then the ID will have some glaring that will render the ID definitely unreadable. If there was an option to upload a photo from storage then making the photo clearer and brighter would be easier.
I have to uninstall it due to because Im new for the personal loan, and that is the only reason why I need to install it. I guess, Im not eligible enough.

It was good app.. but they have removed bdo from the online money transfers. I downloaded the app because of the ease of the transactions and so that i dont have to go to kiosk to have the account loaded. This is also a good way to load prepaid mobile accounts but i guess ill just have to wait until the bdo line is fixed before using the app again.

It is a good app. It functions well when it works. The issue that I just have is even if you have good cellular connection it is slow to connect and seems loading infinitely until you kill the app and login again. Finger print reading contributes to that also, it is sometimes a hit or miss. It seems there is also a bug when upgrading accounts. I tried to upgrade, but when I was ready to finish it says that I already have an existing upgrade being process. That is bad in terms of user experience.

The app looks good. It's easy to register but my only concern for now is when I try to upgrade my account. Every time I submit my info, there's an error that says "Please re-enter city with a maximum of 30 characters only." like I already changed it many times but still shows the same error. I hope this can be fixed, I really wanted to upgrade my Maya account.

Over all paymaya is a good and convenient app. However, in the LOAD portion. There's sometimes an error and I got debited twice in just a single transaction of load in one number. This incident happened to me 2 times already. I hope you will fix this issue. Kindly contact me for screenshot proof.

app is great and secure but I hope they can give rewards faster. and also about buying load, there is no proper filter and no search function. really? that's very easy to implement if your devs were very good.

Hi, please fix the 'add to Favorites' for billers. I've been waiting for it to get fixed. I have been unable to save billers to my Favorites for years now. Needs to reboot my phone everytime I login and it's so inconvenient especially to those very urgent situations. When you call their hotline, you will wait for ages until someone answers. They use how much balance you have as a security measure question which I don't really memorize. And then they will tell you to call again to attempt to experience the same. I want to keep my loyalty to maya as I like their features but this inconvience discourages me.

The app works well, it completes transactions as it should. The only issue I have is customer support. I have already sent required documents for upgrading my account (and have my phone number changed). Customer supported that after I send all the documents, it will be processed after to working days. It's been well over a week now, I have received no news of my issue/account. For my concerns to other users, don't lose your phone.

It's easy to use but available to supermarkets like Waltermart. If you need to login, your password is alphanumeric. GCash uses 4 numerical digits like an ATM, very much easier to login. You don't get reward points, so why use a wallet without significant advantage & difficult to login?

EDIT 12/15/2022. It appears the login issue with Paymaya is that it requires automatically set date/time on the phone to consistently function. As someone that needs customized time to be in advance for personal needs, it's annoying to have to change this on and back off but the app otherwise does work for transactions needed. They do need to improve on their Loan program though to allow more options like having 30 days or monthly payment for bigger loans.

I hope I can get this problem of mine with your finance app fixed as soon as possible with your cooperation and help.
replyContent: Hello Isabel! Thank you for the heads up and we'll take a look at this for you. If you also have an existing case with us. If not, please call us at (02) 845 7788 so that we can properly escalate this. However, please take note that you can only have one account under your number and name. We'll reach out to you asap ðŸ˜Š

content: It takes longer for the savings and card tabs to load. And in some time it wouldn't load at all. I can't seem to add a biller to fave since the feature to add it is being blocked by an in app notification. Hope thesw get addressed as this app is generally great

Upgrading accounts is such a hassle. Compared to other e-wallets, it's much harder to get your account upgraded. Their cashbacks and promo deals are good tho but you won't be able to avail it if you don't have an upgraded account.

I've been using paymaya for a few years now and this is the first time I encountered a problem. I activated maya credit and borrowed money last August. I've been waitig for my billing statement for more than a month but I never received any, as a result I forgot to pay before my due date. I just knew that it is past my due date when I received a message from maya credit that 'they have been constantly reminding me to pay' which they don't.

Their 6% Maya Savings is enticing but I've experienced a long delay on posting how much interest I've earned for last month. Plus it's hard to get a transaction issue resolved from them. Got a refund that after a month still not credited and support isn't helpful.

I'll rate the app as 3 crypto is bug. When you invest either which market it would increase from the real market price. I've been checking on it might be the market price change but it didn't. I've tried to check every market available if you try to buy it would really increase even the market decrease. Hope you would fix it soon. I really loved to invest in this platform since your app is easy to cash in and out.

Paymaya is helpful when it comes to shopping online/Payments/Loag credits/Transfer of Payments. One more thing is, Even I've upgraded my card I still can't make withdrawals in ATM machines nationwide. And I hope those Dev guys could monitor the bugs that I have experienced in using this apps.

Chill out on push notifications! Its like every freaking hour we get bombarded with repeated push notifications and it is annoying! and as an addition, I dont need to be constantly reminded if my wallet is empty, why do you even care? Plus, when will you give us an option to use other OTP methods such as TOTP etc? SMS OTP is unreliable!

Sometimes I get struggles when my limit within the day is over. One time was not able to transact even though I have not sent any amount yet for the day. It was only after 2 days when my account was refreshed. Another experience was when I could not transact for 2 weeks. I had to wait for the month of June.

PLDT Bills Payment phone digit buggy. It wouldn't accept my landline number saying it lacks a digit, but here in San Miguel Bulacan, we really only have 7-digit landline numbers! Please look into this issue, would've been convenient to just pay via your app, but instead, we ended up queueing up outside the PLDT office waiting for Covid to attack.

Please fix the errors that keeps appearing while buying a load. I never knew those errors are delay loads! I tried several times because I thought nothing changed and my balance is still the same lil' did I know later it'll process. I sent too much load because of that errors! So hassle. Plssss fix that.

I am having hard time to cash in. It is too complicated compared to the other app (Gc***). I wish it could be easier since I like the interface and the benefits more than its competitor. Cash in for me is the only issue.

User Interface (UI) is not yet seemless. Though in dashboard, it has new look, if you click some of the functionalities like Cash In, you will still be redirected to old UI. Also, some functionalities are not yet open, like Maya Savings. Since some functionalities are in Beta, it is expected that bugs can be found. Hope Maya will allow users with already upgraded account to access Maya Bank to enjoy 6% promotional interest rate.

I like this app but could you change your security features. OTP isn't working for me. Can you do biometrics or PIN? I don't have signal inside our house and it's really difficult to get the password via text without an option to be sent into email. It sucks.

Frequent late or missed sending of OTP's, especially in the evening. Slow in updating balance after using and adding money. I dont feel confident relying on it in an emergency, if often lets me down. Recent update did not help. Review for Samsung Note 10+.

I love this app because it helped my loading business a lot. But 2 weeks ago i lost my phone and i needed to call their customer service to transfer my balance to other account. As per the customer service representative it will only take 3days to receive the same but it has been 2weeks now since i filed the case and until now i still haven't receive it. I always follow up to their facebook page but they always say its on process. I hope they could process asap because i need the amount so bad.

The app won't show my virtual card's details. But the trick apparently is to have your phone's screen lock feature on as the app won't show hidden information without it. Their tech support isn't bad but the que times leave much to be desired.

The app is quite good but it would be better if the users can have more freedom in the settings area. Like removing the vibration when a transaction is successful and disabling the optional signature when purchasing load. Oh, dark mode please.

Honestly, Paymaya is a good option for online payments for shopping and bills however I'm reluctant to use this often as I find it unreliable especially at times when you can't log in with an error "We did not get a response from the server, please try again in a bit." Its a good app... The new update crashed when I was loading someone and double charged me. I have already filed a refund/help case. 2nd is that there is no back button once you finish a transaction. I have to force close the app.

The app is convrnient and easy to use but everytime you update my paymaya does not work in my iphone5 and I have been messaging you with no help,response and solution. FYI it still does not work ATM. It auomatically shuts down when I open it and YES i did all your troubleshoots already. Thanks!

took me a little while to figure out how to fully use it but I think it has great features and the fact that they have a crypto option, as well as the ability to order a physical card is great. 5 ðŸŒŸ for overall usability. I haven't experienced any issues with Paymaya ever since i started using it years ago. 3ðŸŒŸ for the new design. Honestly, this digi bank is really good, but one of its downside is the difficulty in finding cash-in merchants that has a low convenience fee. Unlike from the other app, it's harder for me to cash in here with minimum fees which I find a financial hindrance considering I'm still a student and my main source of income is cash allowance. Maybe if there will be more merchants (the over-the-counter ones) who can offer minimal or even free cash-in service fee, this app will truly suit my lifestyle.

Once you encounter a problem using this app and your account balance has been deducted, expect that money to be gone forever. I've encountered a problem while purchasing a Steam gaming pin through the app and received a transaction confirmation text. My account was charged but I never received the code to redeem the Steam wallet purchase. I've reached out to their "customer service" to no avail. The response is close to nonexistent at all.

All icons in the apps I can easily open except the crypto apps before I can open it, I don't know what happen I'm worried coz I buy some crypto in there, I already sent message on there helpdesk but no answer until now, hopping that someone will help me. Thanks.

So far so good. The only issue I have is the long delay when logging into the app. Not really an internet issue, my other e-wallets and banking apps loads quick as usual.

I'm loving Maya's credit service but im hoping that the credit limit increase would be for every repayment and not the same amount every time we apply for loan.

Great services, great app. Except for the pop-ups upon entering the app. STOP IT. It's counterproductive and slows down the app. It's just additional steps to get straight to what you need to do. Push service is good enough, no pop-ups necessary.

this is a good app & bank as well. regarding load, sometimes I can search from my contacts but sometimes I cannot. regarding bank interest, you need to spend big just to obtain high interest rate and you need to spend much during the first day of the month just to claim the higher interest rate for the rest of the days of a specific month only. if you God the 8 or 10% rate 2days before the end of the month, you'll enjoy it only for 2 days and it will reset on the following 1st day of the month
Clean, straightforward, and functional app. Bugs/errors are minimal. Very user friendly.
In terms of fund security, I find Maya the best. Their crypto function is not good though and not very comprehensive I had to switch to gcash.

Its better to have the mobile key to approved all the transactions,so that even if no network on a sim provider can still use maya without having to recieved the otp.please consider this idea so it maybe user friendly to all

Maya is a nice digital wallet app. My only concern is that BDO has not been available ever since I've been in the app and it's been 2 months since then. Please fix it because it is such a hassle cashing in. Please please, please

User friendly interface, convenient to pay any transactions. One thing that I don't like here is the ads that pop up even when logging in that sometimes a bit annoying specially when you're in a hurry.

the app is good, Very accessible and it provides wide range of financial services as well as higher interest rates compare to other banks. The only problem is the system crashed sometimes.

I hope they can still add lot of school partners to pay via online for tuition fees or any transaction. However, there's still a room for improvement in this app. I reallly love this app, it's so sleek and very professional looking app.

Nice App! with many cashback vouchers and with no fees when paying bills or transfers.
Great! But it doesn't so sometimes. I hope they will improve the stability and make it more faster a bit. It's a working system. It's not perfect but somehow it does well.

good just like the other app,the only difference,is i cannot loan in this app. i think they had high standard when chosing,i am using this app a year while the other I just use just a month ago and already qualified for their loan.
I have been using maya for few monrhs now. Been updated with my payments, but my credit is not increasing Hope they can offer higher credit.

(Pay)Maya has been useful to me since day 1. I used to just use this app for buying load and I'm glad they now upgraded a lot, even a bank! Can't create new account. It always says "No response from the server." Edit: From 1 star to four stars. I can't create account because I was using vpn and when I turned it off, it worked! Overall, Maya is a trusted e-wallet. I've been using it since 2017 and never had any major issues. But I do have a suggestion. For added security, please enable the option for users to lock their online and physical cards. GCash and other mobile banking apps have this feature, so it's better if you could implement it soon in the Maya UI, too.
just a suggestion that if applicable we should be given a chance to open the app even though we have no internet connection, just like free data.

It's been very nice.
